memberdef.name: G1
memberdef.initializer: do { \ A0 = fBlaMka(A0, B0); \ A1 = fBlaMka(A1, B1); \ \ D0 = _mm_xor_si128(D0, A0); \ D1 = _mm_xor_si128(D1, A1); \ \ D0 = _mm_roti_epi64(D0, -32); \ D1 = _mm_roti_epi64(D1, -32); \ \ C0 = fBlaMka(C0, D0); \ C1 = fBlaMka(C1, D1); \ \ B0 = _mm_xor_si128(B0, C0); \ B1 = _mm_xor_si128(B1, C1); \ \ B0 = _mm_roti_epi64(B0, -24); \ B1 = _mm_roti_epi64(B1, -24); \ } while ((void)0, 0)

memberdef.name: G2
memberdef.initializer: do { \ A0 = fBlaMka(A0, B0); \ A1 = fBlaMka(A1, B1); \ \ D0 = _mm_xor_si128(D0, A0); \ D1 = _mm_xor_si128(D1, A1); \ \ D0 = _mm_roti_epi64(D0, -16); \ D1 = _mm_roti_epi64(D1, -16); \ \ C0 = fBlaMka(C0, D0); \ C1 = fBlaMka(C1, D1); \ \ B0 = _mm_xor_si128(B0, C0); \ B1 = _mm_xor_si128(B1, C1); \ \ B0 = _mm_roti_epi64(B0, -63); \ B1 = _mm_roti_epi64(B1, -63); \ } while ((void)0, 0)

memberdef.name: DIAGONALIZE
memberdef.initializer: do { \ __m128i t0 = D0; \ __m128i t1 = B0; \ D0 = C0; \ C0 = C1; \ C1 = D0; \ D0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(D1, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(t0, t0)); \ D1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(D1, D1)); \ B0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(B0, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(B1, B1)); \ B1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(B1, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(t1, t1)); \ } while ((void)0, 0)

memberdef.name: UNDIAGONALIZE
memberdef.initializer: do { \ __m128i t0, t1; \ t0 = C0; \ C0 = C1; \ C1 = t0; \ t0 = B0; \ t1 = D0; \ B0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(B1, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(B0, B0)); \ B1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(t0, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(B1, B1)); \ D0 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(D0, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(D1, D1)); \ D1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(D1, _mm_unpacklo_epi64(t1, t1)); \ } while ((void)0, 0)
